price: Kuma aka tattara, dõmin Sulaimãn, rundunõninsa, daga aljannu da mutãne da tsuntsãye, to, sũ anã kange su (ga tafiya).
arabic: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waḥushira lisulaymāna junūduhu mina al-jini wal-insi wal-ṭayri fahum yūzaʿūna
